TOOLTIPS.ID: Unique technical ID of the Product
TOOLTIPS.NAME: Unique Name of the Product
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: How the Product was created? Set at creation time.
TOOLTIPS.BASE_PATH: The basic path through which the product can be accessed. It must be unique across all products
TOOLTIPS.ICON_NAME: Name of the icons from the PrimeNG icon library. Used, for example, as a default icon for menu entries
TOOLTIPS.CLASSIFICATIONS: Comma-separated list of terms to classify the product, e.g. Game, Tool etc. Can be used for filtering

HTTP_STATUS_403.APPS: You have no permissions to see Apps.
